description: By using lay on hands, you can bring the dead back to life.

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Cha 19, Greater Mercy, lay on hands, mercy class feature.

sections.text: You can expend 10 uses of lay on hands to bring a single dead creature you touch back to life as a raise dead spell with a caster level equal to your paladin level. You must provide the material component for raise dead or choose to accept 1 temporary negative level; this level automatically goes away after 24 hours, never becomes a permanent negative level, and cannot be overcome in any way except by waiting for the duration to expire.
sections.name: Benefits

name: Ultimate Mercy
